languages.text: "Это — Прорва. Место, где влачат свое существование те, кому предназначено выйти на арену ведьминского культа Губительной жажды. И те, кем пренебрег гемункул Тервантьяс из ковена Зловещего Шипа, который поглощен своими изысканиями в одном из закутков Прорвы. Это место — бесконечный источник... материала для его экспериментов, лучшие из которых предназначаются кабалу Опустошительной бури — покровителю ведьминского культа и лично Тервантьяса".

traits.locale_text: "Это — Прорва. Место, где влачат свое существование те, кому предназначено выйти на арену ведьминского культа Выколотого Глаза. И те, кем пренебрег гемункул Тервантьяс из ковена Зловещего Шипа, который поглощен своими изысканиями в одном из закутков Прорвы. Это место — бесконечный источник... материала для его экспериментов, лучшие из которых предназначаются кабалу Опустошительной Бури — покровителю ведьминского культа и лично Тервантьяса".

languages.text: "This is the Chasm. The place where those destined for the arena of the Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst eke out their existence. It's also where the Haemonculus's cast-offs end up. Tervantias from the Coven of the Baleful Thorn — he has his own little nook where he conducts his experiments. The Chasm is endless source of... raw material for his work, and the best results are destined for the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — the patron of the Wych Cult and of Tervantias in particular."
languages.original_text: "Это — Прорва. Место, где влачат свое существование те, кому предназначено выйти на арену ведьминского культа Губительной жажды. И те, кем пренебрег гемункул Тервантьяс из ковена Зловещего Шипа, который поглощен своими изысканиями в одном из закутков Прорвы. "This is the Chasm. The place where those destined for the arena of the Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst eke out their existence. It's also where the Haemonculus's cast-offs end up. Tervantias from the Coven of the Baleful Thorn — he has his own little nook where he conducts his experiments. The Chasm is endless source of... raw material for his work, and the best results are destined for the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — the patron of the Wych Cult and of Tervantias in particular."

languages.text: “这里是裂隙，那些注定要进入致命饥渴巫灵教派的竞技场的人们在这里挣扎求生。那些遭到血伶人遗弃的家伙，最后也会沦落到这个地方。毒棘密会的特万提亚斯也在这里搞了个小小的角落，在那里进行实验。裂隙可以为他提供……无穷无尽的原材料，而他最成功的实验成果，则会献给狂风阴谋团。那个阴谋团是巫灵教派的赞助者，对特万提亚斯尤为青睐有加。”
languages.original_text: "This is the Chasm. The place where those destined for the arena of the Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst eke out their existence. It's also where the Haemonculus's cast-offs end up. Tervantias from the Coven of the Baleful Thorn — he has his own little nook where he conducts his experiments. The Chasm is endless source of... raw material for his work, and the best results are destined for the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — the patron of the Wych Cult and of Tervantias in particular."

traits.locale_text: “这里是裂隙，那些注定要进入致命饥渴巫灵教派的竞技场的人们在这里挣扎求生。那些遭到血伶人遗弃的家伙，最后也会沦落到这个地方。毒棘密会的特万提亚斯也在这里搞了个小小的角落，在那里进行实验。裂隙可以为他提供……无穷无尽的原材料，而他最成功的实验成果，则会献给狂风阴谋团。那个阴谋团是巫灵教派的赞助者，对特万提亚斯尤为青睐有加。”

languages.text: «Estás en el Abismo. El lugar donde los destinados a la arena del Culto de Brujas de la Sed Letal se buscan la vida. También acaban aquí los despojos del Hemónculo. Se trata de Tervantias, del Cónclave de la Espina Funesta. Tiene aquí un rincón para sus experimentos. El Abismo es una fuente inagotable de... materia prima para su obra, y los mejores resultados están destinados a la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora, que patrocina al Culto de Brujas y especialmente a Tervantias».
languages.original_text: "This is the Chasm. The place where those destined for the arena of the Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst eke out their existence. It's also where the Haemonculus's cast-offs end up. Tervantias from the Coven of the Baleful Thorn — he has his own little nook where he conducts his experiments. The Chasm is endless source of... raw material for his work, and the best results are destined for the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — the patron of the Wych Cult and of Tervantias in particular."

traits.locale_text: «Estás en el Abismo. El lugar donde los destinados a la arena del Culto de Brujas de la Sed Letal se buscan la vida. También acaban aquí los despojos del Hemónculo. Se trata de Tervantias, del Cónclave de la Espina Funesta. Tiene aquí un rincón para sus experimentos. El Abismo es una fuente inagotable de... materia prima para su obra, y los mejores resultados están destinados a la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora, que patrocina al Culto de Brujas y especialmente a Tervantias».

languages.text: 「ここは亀裂と呼ばれている。死の渇きの魔女団の闘技場に行く運命にある者たちがここで暮らしている。また、ハモンキュラスが使い捨てた者たちが流れ着く場所でもある。盟約団凶兆の茨のテルヴァンティアスは専用の部屋を持っていて、そこで実験を行っている。亀裂は彼に実験用の“生の材料”を無限に提供してくれる場であり、最高の被験者は魔女団、特にテルヴァンティアスのパトロンである陰謀団、略奪の嵐に引き渡される」
languages.original_text: "This is the Chasm. The place where those destined for the arena of the Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst eke out their existence. It's also where the Haemonculus's cast-offs end up. Tervantias from the Coven of the Baleful Thorn — he has his own little nook where he conducts his experiments. The Chasm is endless source of... raw material for his work, and the best results are destined for the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — the patron of the Wych Cult and of Tervantias in particular."

traits.locale_text: 「ここは亀裂と呼ばれている。死の渇きの魔女団の闘技場に行く運命にある者たちがここで暮らしている。また、ハモンキュラスが使い捨てた者たちが流れ着く場所でもある。盟約団凶兆の茨のテルヴァンティアスは専用の部屋を持っていて、そこで実験を行っている。亀裂は彼に実験用の“生の材料”を無限に提供してくれる場であり、最高の被験者は魔女団、特にテルヴァンティアスのパトロンである陰謀団、略奪の嵐に引き渡される」

languages.text: "Das ist die Kluft. Hier darben jene vor sich hin, die für die Arena des Hekatarii-Kults des Fatalen Dursts bestimmt sind. Und hier landen auch jene, die der Haemonculus aussortiert. Tervantias vom Zirkel des Unheilvollen Dorns hat seine eigene kleine Nische, in der er seine Experimente durchführt. Die Kluft ist eine endlose Quelle von ... Rohmaterial für seine Arbeit, und die besten Ergebniss sind für die Kabale des plündernden Sturms bestimmt — den Schutzherren des Hekatarii-Kults und besonders von Tervantias selbst."
languages.original_text: "This is the Chasm. The place where those destined for the arena of the Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst eke out their existence. It's also where the Haemonculus's cast-offs end up. Tervantias from the Coven of the Baleful Thorn — he has his own little nook where he conducts his experiments. The Chasm is endless source of... raw material for his work, and the best results are destined for the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — the patron of the Wych Cult and of Tervantias in particular."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist die Kluft. Hier darben jene vor sich hin, die für die Arena des Hekatarii-Kults des Fatalen Dursts bestimmt sind. Und hier landen auch jene, die der Haemonculus aussortiert. Tervantias vom Zirkel des Unheilvollen Dorns hat seine eigene kleine Nische, in der er seine Experimente durchführt. Die Kluft ist eine endlose Quelle von ... languages.text: « Nous sommes dans l'Abîme, où vivotent ceux qui sont destinés à se battre dans l'arène du Culte Céraste de la Soif Fatale. C'est également ici qu'atterrissent les rebuts de l'hémoncule. Tervantias, de la Coterie de l'Épine Funeste, y possède son propre petit repaire où il peut mener ses expériences. L'Abîme est une source infinie de... matière première pour son travail, et il offre ses meilleurs résultats à la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, qui contrôle le Culte Céraste et plus particulièrement Tervantias lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "This is the Chasm. The place where those destined for the arena of the Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst eke out their existence. It's also where the Haemonculus's cast-offs end up. Tervantias from the Coven of the Baleful Thorn — he has his own little nook where he conducts his experiments. The Chasm is endless source of... raw material for his work, and the best results are destined for the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — the patron of the Wych Cult and of Tervantias in particular."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes dans la Faille, où vivotent ceux qui sont destinés à se battre dans l'arène du Culte Céraste de la Soif Fatale. C'est également ici qu'atterrissent les rebuts de l'hémoncule. Tervantias, de la Coterie de l'Épine Funeste, y possède son propre petit repaire où il peut mener ses expériences. La Faille est une source infinie de... matière première pour son travail, et il offre ses meilleurs résultats à la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, qui contrôle le Culte Céraste et plus particulièrement Tervantias lui-même. »

languages.text: "Buraya Yarık diyoruz. Ölüme Susamışlığın Viç Tarikatı'na ait arenada ölmeyi kader bilenlerin ömürlerini geçirdiği bir yerdir. Ayrıca Haimonkulus'un sürgüne yolladıkları da kendini burada bulur. Meşum Diken Meclisi'nden Tervantias'ın deneyler yaptığı küçük bir mekânı var, o da burada. Yarık, deneyleri için kullanabileceği... sınırsız ham madde sağlıyor. Aldığı sonuçlardan en iyilerini de Viç Tarikatı'nın ve özellikle Tervantias'ın hamisi olan Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'na gönderiyor."
languages.original_text: "This is the Chasm. The place where those destined for the arena of the Wych Cult of the Fatal Thirst eke out their existence. It's also where the Haemonculus's cast-offs end up. Tervantias from the Coven of the Baleful Thorn — he has his own little nook where he conducts his experiments. The Chasm is endless source of... raw material for his work, and the best results are destined for the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — the patron of the Wych Cult and of Tervantias in particular."
